Author: Hoc
Name: QuickSwitch
Description: Detects your characters on login and lets you quickly switch between them with a single click. Supports both quick logout to character select and fully automated character switching. Features safety guards (cooldowns, confirmations, blocks during combat/duties/cutscenes/crafting/gathering), Discord bot integration for remote switching, and admin controls (whitelist/blacklist, force switch/logout, audit logging).
